meanings.definition: The way in which someone stands, especially when it is important to show their attitude or feelings.
meanings.sent1: Her stances during the debate revealed her confidence and determination.
meanings.sent2: He always takes a firm stance on environmental issues.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's funny stance made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His stance on honesty is like a pillar of strength.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's graceful stance captivated the audience.

meanings.definition: A way of thinking about something, especially one that is typical of a particular group of people.
meanings.sent1: The political party's stances on healthcare are well-known.
meanings.sent2: Different cultures have unique stances on marriage.
meanings.sent3: The cat's curious stance on chasing its tail puzzled the owner.
meanings.sent4: Her stance on forgiveness is a beacon of hope in a world of grudges.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's strict stance on discipline kept the class in line.
